content: You know, if Merom is the best use of tons, which I think the majority of the time it will be, that's where we'll take them, but like we just showed, if third party customers are willing to pay more than we feel worth at the plant, we're willing to execute on that plan as well. We are now fully contracted for 2023 and at the prices we're talking about and the production cost numbers that we're expecting, we think that will generate $160 million of adjusted EBITDA, which we basically had tripled our business that will generate enough cash flow to pay off all of our debt, almost here in the next, let's just call it 13 months.
